abstract: The move is a significant step toward vanquishing the local video store and keeping couch potatoes planted firmly in front of their televisions and computers.
snippet: The move is a significant step toward vanquishing the local video store and keeping couch potatoes planted firmly in front of their televisions and computers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  In a significant step toward vanquishing the local video store and keeping couch potatoes planted firmly in front of their televisions and computers, Amazon.com will introduce a new online store of TV shows and movies on Thursday, called Amazon Video on Demand.

headline.main: Amazon Plans an Online Store for Movies and TV Shows
headline.print_headline: Amazon Plans an Online Store for Movies and TV Shows
